scripts.doc: lerna exec --scope www -- npm run build
scripts.start: lerna exec --scope www -- npm run start
scripts.build: lerna exec --scope @uiw/* -- tsbb build src/*.tsx --use-babel --cjs cjs --bail && npm run css:build && npm run css:build:dist
scripts.watch: lerna exec "tsbb watch src/*.tsx --use-babel --cjs cjs" --scope @uiw/* & npm run css:watch
scripts.bundle: lerna exec --scope @uiw/* -- ncc build src/index.tsx --target web --filename dist
scripts.bundle:min: lerna exec --scope @uiw/* -- ncc build src/index.tsx --target web --filename dist --minify
scripts.remove: npm run clean && lerna exec "rm -rf package-lock.json" --scope react-code-preview-layout --scope www
